entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
